amendment.description: To facilitate a reforestation program in Afghanistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1989 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1989 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S13345-13346; text: CR S13345) To facilitate a reforestation program in Afghanistan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1989 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
